preparation: Coat large skillet with cooking spray, and heat
Add 2 lb. mushrooms, and cook 10 to 12 minutes
Carefully stir in ½ cup water, and cook until all liquid is evaporated.
Remove from heat, and stir in soup, mustard, and rosemary, and season with salt and pepper
Reduce oven heat to 450°F, and bake 50 minutes to 1 hour more
